Straight Shot sits well in Kups hands, ready and rearing for battle.

"Okay=
, let's get this party started.  It's about time we stuck a few arrows up l=
izard afts tail end."

Night Shift chuckles at Straight Shot's statement, a=
s he acklowledges Perceptor's downloads.

" Gettn' 'em now Perceptor.  Maaa=
an talk about heavy intel.  There's no chance I'm gonna get lost now.  Hmmm=
, I might be able ta configure a safe short cut inta the fortress...  Any c=
hance ya got the codes ta disable any security software I might have ta kno=
w about?"

Tucson waits patiently for Cheetor's news of clear passage as he=
 transforms into his vehicle mode, opening his doors to Lord Elder, and Tal=
on.  His engine rumbles at the start yet runs quietly after being started, =
which was a signature trade mark of his previous vehicle form, who's engine=
 was barely even heard when standing idol.  Night Shift also gets into vehi=
cle form, opening his doors to Windlord and Perceptor.  His engine silences=
 after being started yet remains idol.

" Night Shift, as soon as Cheetor c=
omes back, and relays the intel, you will slowly advance into position with=
 Perceptor and Windlord.  Take your time, we are not rushing into this beca=
use the faster we travel, the faster we will raise suspicion.  Feel free to=
 take any path you wish.  If you wish to go off road, even better.  Try not=
 to kick up any dust on your tires if you can help it."

Night Shift nodds.=


"Gotchya.  If anyone can roll in silent mode, it's me."

Tucson then turn=
s to Rodimus.

"If I can get everyone to move in slowly, we have a very goo=
d chance of going unseen and unheard.  I also plan to send a mild sonar wav=
e which should mask all our signatures, including those of Perceptors, by u=
sing a signal configuration code.  I haven't tried doing that but I do know=
 my sonar system can work around various codes and configure a buffer that =
will not harm anyone who isn't under our signature.  If at any time, you fe=
el that our plan is not working, feel free to intervine".

Quickstride then=
 turns to Lord Elder and Rodimus.

"I should definitely be able to smell tr=
ouble if it comes.  And don't worry, I won't let anyone down.  Just to let =
you guys know, I work better in beast form, since that's where all my sense=
s are.  Well, I better get out there'n start patrol duty.  You'll know wher=
e ta find me.  QUICKSTRIDE, MAXIMIZE!"  

With that he gets into his equine=
 mode and walks out instead of bolting out of the Ark, to keep suspcions lo=
w.  He sniffs the ground and as part of the illusion, nibbles at a few blad=
es of grass.  Yet, his ears remain focused on the task at hand as does his =
eyes and nose.  He raises his head while nibbling, remaining still and doin=
g what horses do best, which was staying still, and occasionally lowering t=
heir heads for a few snips of grass.
